text: 17:8 Dan 7:7; Phong 11:7; Isei 69:28Nangna uriba sa asi matam amada leirammi, adubu mahak houjikti leitre; adumakpu mahak makha naidaba kom adudagi amuk kakhatlakkadouri aduga mahakki mang-takphamda chatkani. Taibangpan semdringei mamangdagi hingbagi lairikta makhoigi ming isinkhidaba malemda leibasingna sa adubu uba matamda ngakkani, maramdi mahakna matam amada leirammi, houjikna leitre adumakpu amuk lakkadouri.
